CustomField.description: only needed when Attach Letter button refers to the letterAttach scontrol (as opposed to the LetterRequest VF page)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: when including Attach Letter button to an object, add object API name to this list. comma-delimited. no spaces. do not include Permit2, License2, Application2. The shorter this list, the quicker the page loads.
CustomField.label: Single Man. Reqst Objects - Additional
